question: Which one of the following statements is not correct?
option1: Ali Mardan Khan introduced the system of revenue farming in Bengal.
option2: Maharaja Ranjit Singh set up modern foundries to manufacture Cannons at Lahore.
option3: Sawai Jai Singh of Amber had Euclid’s ‘Elements of Geometry’ translated into Sanskrit.
option4: Sultan Tipu of Mysore gave money for the construction of the idol of Goddess Sharda in the Shringeri temple.
answer: Ali Mardan Khan introduced the system of revenue farming in Bengal.
explanation: Murshid Quli Khan, also known as Mohammad Hadi was the first Nawab of Bengal, serving from 1717 to 1727. Murshid Quli Khan introduced the system of revenue farming in Bengal.
